description:
Part of the bestselling collection of basics, the prAna Long Sleeve T-Shirt for men is, without question, one of the best everyday essentials you can add to your wardrobe. The reason? They’ll show you.

This style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning it’s good for the planet and its people. It starts with a sustainable blend of organic cotton and recycled poly, which we use to make a breathably lightweight jersey fabric. Then it’s assembled by their Fair Trade Certified™ Factory partners around the globe. And with a classic look that never goes off trend, talk about a style that feels good in more ways than one.
name: Prana prAna LS T-Shirt - Mens
